title: Add Laundry Bill (Price Calculator) UI with 5 item types and per-item pricing

requirements.text: Add a "Laundry Price Calculator" UI that matches the user-provided item list and pricing: Shirt ₹10, Pant ₹10, Saree ₹50, Paithani Saree ₹100, Drilling Saree ₹150; include quantity number inputs for each item (default 0) and show a total in INR starting at "Total: ₹0".

quotes:
Laundry Price Calculator











Total: ₹0

acceptanceCriteria: The UI contains 5 quantity inputs labeled in English: Shirt, Pant, Saree, Paithani Saree, Drilling Saree.
Each input defaults to 0 and is type=number with non-negative behavior.
A "Total Calculate" button exists; clicking it updates the displayed total.
The total display is rendered as "Total: ₹<number>" and starts at "Total: ₹0" on first load.
The computed total equals (shirtQty*10 + pantQty*10 + sareeQty*50 + paithaniQty*100 + drillingQty*150).

requirements.text: Add basic input validation for the calculator quantity inputs: prevent negative values and treat empty/invalid input as 0 so total calculation never produces NaN or negative totals.
acceptanceCriteria: Entering a negative number results in the stored quantity being clamped to 0 (or the UI preventing negatives).
If a quantity field is cleared (empty), the calculator treats it as 0 and total calculation still works.
Total never displays NaN and never displays a negative value.

requirements.text: Ensure all user-facing text added/updated for the calculator is in English (e.g., headings, labels, button text, total label).

quotes: Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.

acceptanceCriteria: All calculator-related labels and messages are English-only.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn/ui sources); compose them if needed.
Do not modify immutable hook files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Respect the existing single-actor Motoko backend architecture; no additional backend canisters/services.
nonGoals: Do not add third-party auth providers (only Internet Identity is allowed).
Do not add external databases or third-party APIs.
Do not change the existing custom domain validation rules unless explicitly requested.
